## Source: amazon-inspector (adc760a1f5b29980f41bbd685a2472e4f835f234b483c17520a81c1c881ca420)
The package bola511 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (eea756cc3e9de36a5fb64a18448c1134945c9e97ac25b152267025711e700410)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'bola511' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
